name: Endless Nightmare (itch)
description:
Adapted from the novel "That time when I get reincarnated in a forest with ghosts that I have to shoot with my gun."

You're just awake, and quickly realizes that you're in a dark forest, with nobody in sight.

But your instinct tells you, there's bad things lurking around here.

Equipped with your gun, try to survive!

Note: This game is designed to be played with Google Cardboard VR
